title: I need to complain. I am not getting service under warranty. Where to complain other than chat?
content: My device is in warranty. I am not able to chat. Pickup from home location (a city) is not happening. I want to complain. The keypad is not working. Device has become unusable. I tried factory reset multiple times. It doesn't work. The device has no external damage. Where should I complain? Is there any email ID?
